description: Explore the impact of Arbitrum on Ethereum through a comprehensive guide addressing its architecture, benefits, and challenges. Learn about optimistic rollups and how Arbitrum enhances scalability and reduces transaction costs while maintaining security.
keywords: Arbitrum, Ethereum, blockchain, layer-2 scaling, scalability, transaction fees, optimistic rollups, dApps, blockchain interoperability
title: A Deep Dive into Arbitrum and Its Impact on Ethereum
